Package edu.rpi.legup.model.gameboard

Class GridCell<T>

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.legup.model.gameboard.PuzzleElement<T>
edu.rpi.legup.model.gameboard.GridCell<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of data held by the GridCell
Direct Known Subclasses:
BattleshipCell, BinaryCell, FillapixCell, HeyawakeCell, LightUpCell, MasyuCell, MinesweeperCell, NurikabeCell, ShortTruthTableCell, SkyscrapersCell, StarBattleCell, SudokuCell, ThermometerCell, TreeTentCell
public class GridCell<T> extends PuzzleElement<T>
GridCell represents a cell within a grid-based board. It holds data of type T and tracks its location on the board using a Point. The class extends from PuzzleElement and supports deep copying of the grid cell.
